Uses of Class
de.upb.t2t.control.gui.transcriber.TranscriptionSegment

  • Packages that use TranscriptionSegment 
    Package Description
    de.upb.t2t.control  

    • Uses of TranscriptionSegment in de.upb.t2t.control

      Methods in de.upb.t2t.control that return TranscriptionSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static TranscriptionSegment Transcriber.getLastSegment(java.util.List<TranscriptionSegment> list)
      A convenience function to retrieve the last element of a List of TranscriptionSegments, just as Stack.peek() would.
      private TranscriptionSegment Transcriber.newEnclosingDelimiterSegment()
      Returns a new instance of a TranscriptionSegment that contains nothing transcriptionwise but the notational slash ("/") that signals the beginning and ending of a transcription.
      private TranscriptionSegment Transcriber.newInnerDelimiterSegment(java.lang.String punctuation)
      Returns a new instance of a TranscriptionSegment that contains nothing transcriptionwise but the notational single or double bars that indicate the original punctuation such as "
      Methods in de.upb.t2t.control with parameters of type TranscriptionSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void Transcriber.addSegmentToListAndMainPane(TranscriptionSegment finishedSegment, java.util.List<TranscriptionSegment> finishedSegments)
      A convenience method that adds the given segment both to the given list, but also to the MainTranscriptionPane.outputField.
      Method parameters in de.upb.t2t.control with type arguments of type TranscriptionSegment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void Transcriber.addSegmentToListAndMainPane(TranscriptionSegment finishedSegment, java.util.List<TranscriptionSegment> finishedSegments)
      A convenience method that adds the given segment both to the given list, but also to the MainTranscriptionPane.outputField.
      private void Transcriber.doPostProcessing(java.util.List<TranscriptionSegment> finishedSegments)
      This function should only be called after the finished TranscriptionSegments have been added to the MainTranscriptionPane.
      private static TranscriptionSegment Transcriber.getLastSegment(java.util.List<TranscriptionSegment> list)
      A convenience function to retrieve the last element of a List of TranscriptionSegments, just as Stack.peek() would.
